h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
content: Follow the friendly Shen Monkey inside to the cave on the right, and you’ll find that he’s a merchant of gourds, drinks, and brews! Be sure to check all of his options out:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell' and the sub-subsection 'Marsh of the White Mist'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the friendly Shen Monkey inside to the cave on the right, and you’ll find that he’s a merchant of gourds, drinks, and brews! Be sure to check all of his options out:
